Talk_0050:
<sp:3:0:2:0b00><snd:SurpriseM>What are you doing? <sp:5:0:0>The lightning here is
not to be messed with!<sp:0:4:0>I'm going find a <clr:0000>roof to hide under<clr:ffff>, since
I've got a brain between my ears.
Talk_0060:
<sp:3:0:2:0b00><snd:SurpriseS>Hey, you!<sp:5:0:0> You're not carrying anything
that's made of metal, right?<sp:0:4:0><sp:3:0:2:0701>Unless you've got lightning-proof clothes,
that's a recipe for what I'll euphemistically
call <sp:5:0:0>a bad time.<sp:0:4:0>The rain can be your friend. Rising water
levels help you get to some hard-to-reach
places. But be careful, or... <sp:5:0:0>Bzzt... <sp:5:0:0>Bzzt...<sp:5:0:0>
<sp:3:0:2:0b00><snd:SurpriseL><sp:0:2:2:7d00>BANG!<sp:0:4:0><sp:3:0:2:0701><sp:0:2:2:6400>...The lightning here doesn't mess around.
Talk_0070:
<sp:3:0:2:0100><snd:Happy>Ah, yes, clear weather! <sp:5:1:0>Enjoy it while
it lasts!
Talk_0001:
<sp:3:0:2:0700><snd:TalkPositive_01>Hey. <sp:5:0:0>You're an adventurer, aren't you?
You've gotta be to get out here.<sp:0:4:0>I bet you've come to see the strange
creatures. <sp:5:0:0>Or maybe all of the old ruins
around this area?<sp:0:4:0><sp:3:0:2:0501>I'll tell you, this area<clr:0000> <clr:ffff>has its challenges.
The heavy rains make steady footing
hard to come by.
<sp:3:0:2:0100><snd:TalkPositive_00>Still, if you wander around, you never
know what you'll find! Just don't let any
lightning...<sp:5:0:0>find you first.
Talk_0010:
<sp:3:0:2:0101><snd:Greeting_00>Look at that!<sp:5:0:0> Fate brings us together
again.<sp:5:0:0> I have a story I think you'll
appreciate.
You know Rassla Lake to the southeast?
There's a flooded cave there.<sp:0:4:0>I went to it on one of our precious few
clear days, hoping to find some treasure.

<sp:3:0:2:0b00><snd:SurpriseS_00>But no sooner did I arrive than it started
raining outside.<sp:0:4:0>And get thisâ€”<sp:5:0:0>the water level rose
so high that it blocked me from going
deeper inside the cave!
<sp:3:0:2:0100><snd:LaughL_00>In the end, I went home empty-handed.
But hey, that's what makes exploring so
fun! <sp:5:0:0>Ha!
Talk_0020:
<sp:3:0:2:0700><snd:TalkPositive>Some places, you can only reach on clear
days. <sp:5:0:0>Others, only when it's raining.<sp:0:4:0>In other words, adventurers don't get a
day off! <clr:0000><sp:5:1:0><clr:ffff>This area always has something
to entice us!
Talk_0030:
<sp:3:0:2:0b00><snd:SurpriseS>You're gonna get drenched standing
there, bud!
Talk_0040:
<sp:3:0:2:0a00><snd:Think>As you can see, it's usually raining here.
<sp:5:0:0>And sometimes I'll be going about my
business when suddenly...<sp:5:0:0> Bzzt... <sp:5:0:0>Bzzt...<sp:5:0:0><sp:0:4:0><sp:3:0:2:0b00><snd:SurpriseL><sp:0:2:2:7d00>BANG!<sp:0:2:2:6400><sp:0:4:0>A bolt of lightning lands right near me!<sp:5:0:0>
Or I'll be exploring on a crystal clear day
and all of a sudden... <sp:5:0:0>Drip... <sp:5:0:0>Drop...<sp:5:0:0><sp:0:4:0><sp:3:0:2:0701>...Drip. <sp:5:0:0>You probably thought I was going
to shout again, huh?<sp:0:4:0><sp:3:0:2:0a00><snd:Sad>Anyway, it rains and the water level rises,
and sometimes it blocks my path home.<sp:0:4:0><sp:3:0:2:0700>So if you're gonna hang around here,
just know the rain and lightning aren't
your friends!
